item.description: About Me I’m a researcher in the field of digital signal processing, and most interested in all things that are related to audio.

Projects This page lists some of the projects I’ve been working on. Classification of Impulsive Disturbances To allow for an unsupervised restoration of impulsive disturbances in archive audio applications, we have developed an algorithm that classifies an audio recording as either disturbed or undisturbed. The corresponding website contains more information and makes a number of demonstration signals available for listening. Noise Power Spectral Density Estimation Most of the existing algorithms for noise power spectral density (PSD) estimation in audio signals were developed for the application with speech signals.
